data.lyric:
[ti:Here Comes Santa Claus ]
[ar:Gene Autry]
[al:美国怪谭第2季 电视原声带 American Horror Story Season 2(Original Soundtrack) ]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Here Comes Santa Claus (Down Santa Claus Lane) - Gene Autry
[00:10.80]Here comes Santa Claus  here comes Santa Claus
[00:13.40]Right down Santa Claus Lane
[00:15.97]Vixen Blitzen all his reindeer
[00:18.35]Pulling on the reins
[00:20.96]Bells are ringing children singing
[00:23.28]All is merry and bright
[00:25.62]So hang your stockings and say a prayer
[00:28.04]Cause Santa Claus comes tonight
[00:30.91]Here comes Santa Claus  here comes Santa Claus
[00:33.24]Riding down Santa Claus Lane
[00:35.82]He's got a bag that's filled with toys
[00:37.96]For boys and girls again
[00:40.82]Hear those sleigh bells jingle jangle
[00:43.61]What a beautiful sight
[00:45.50]So jump in bed and cover up your head
[00:47.83]Because Santa Claus comes tonight
[01:10.76]Here comes Santa Claus  here comes Santa Claus
[01:13.09]Riding down Santa Claus Lane
[01:15.72]He doesn't care if you're a rich or poor boy
[01:17.84]He loves you just the same
[01:20.64]Santa Claus
[01:21.13]Knows that we're God's children
[01:23.01]That makes everything right
[01:25.34]So fill your hears with Christmas cheer
[01:27.81]Cause Santa Claus comes tonight
[01:30.67]Here comes Santa Claus here comes Santa Claus
[01:33.08]Riding down Santa Claus Lane
[01:35.60]He'll come around when the chimes ring out
[01:37.83]It's Christmas morn again
[01:40.56]Peace on Earth will come to all
[01:42.78]If we just follow the light
[01:45.39]So Let's give thanks to the Lord above
[01:47.76]Cause Santa Claus comes tonight
[01:50.74]
[02:10.62]Here comes Santa Claus  here comes Santa Claus
[02:12.99]Right down Santa Claus Lane
[02:15.52]Vixen Blitzen all his reindeer
[02:17.98]Pulling on the reins
[02:20.58]Bells are ringing children singing
[02:22.96]All is merry and bright
[02:25.57]Hang your stockings and say a prayer
[02:27.68]Cause Santa Claus comes tonight
data.trans:
[ti:]
[ar:Gene Autry]
[al:美国怪谭第2季 电视原声带 American Horror Story Season 2(Original Soundtrack) ]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:10.80]圣诞老人来了 圣诞老人来了
[00:13.40]就沿着圣诞老人的小路
[00:15.97]雌狐 闪电以及他所有的驯鹿
[00:18.35]都拉着缰绳
[00:20.96]铃儿叮当 孩子们欢唱
[00:23.28]一片欢乐与光明
[00:25.62]快挂上你红色袜子 说出你的愿望
[00:28.04]因为圣诞老人今晚就要来
[00:30.91]圣诞老人来了 圣诞老人来了
[00:33.24]就沿着圣诞老人的小路
[00:35.82]他带着满满一袋的玩具
[00:37.96]送给男孩和女孩们
[00:40.82]聆听见那雪橇铃儿叮当响彻
[00:43.61]那是多么美妙的情景
[00:45.50]快钻进被窝盖住头
[00:47.83]因为圣诞老人今晚就要来
[01:10.76]圣诞老人来了 圣诞老人来了
[01:13.09]就沿着圣诞老人的小路
[01:15.72]他不在乎你是富有还是贫穷
[01:17.84]他都爱你
[01:20.64]圣诞老人
[01:21.13]知道我们都是上帝的孩子
[01:23.01]已做好一切准备
[01:25.34]所以 听着圣诞的欢呼吧
[01:27.81]因为圣诞老人今晚就要来
[01:30.67]圣诞老人来了圣诞老人来了
[01:33.08]就沿着圣诞老人的小路
[01:35.60]当编钟鸣响他就将来到你我身边
[01:37.83]又是圣诞节的黎明
[01:40.56]那这星球就将一派祥和与安宁
[01:42.78]倘若我们紧随那光明
[01:45.39]就让我们感恩于那上苍的主
[01:47.76]因为圣诞老人今晚就要来
[01:50.74]
[02:10.62]圣诞老人来了 圣诞老人来了
[02:12.99]就沿着圣诞老人的小路
[02:15.52]雌狐 闪电以及他所有的驯鹿
[02:17.98]都拉着缰绳
[02:20.58]铃儿叮当 孩子们欢唱
[02:22.96]一片欢乐与光明
[02:25.57]快挂上你红色袜子 说出你的愿望
[02:27.68]因为圣诞老人今晚就要来
